Articles.Content:
Hey guys, my buddy is streaming! If you wanna help support the community, it would mean the world to him if you stopped by and said hi! =D 

[http://www.twitch.tv/wrenpheonix](http://www.twitch.tv/wrenpheonix)

Moved to Live from Mission Control.

Anything in particular wrenpheonix plans on doing in the stream?
